title: Hidden universe: the brain. Part 2
creator_credit: Tom Bywaters, American Broadcasting Company and CRM/McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Discusses the cause of aphasia and shows experiments with infants which test their cognitive development and general learning patterns. Also includes a study of visial perception and the advances being made toward giving sight to the blind, as well as looking at a variety of brain malfunctions and current treatment.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Bywaters, American Broadcasting Company and CRM/McGraw-Hill Films
